main.name: Luke Harrison
main.description: I am a full-stack web developer, visual artist, web consultant, and wearer of many hats.
main.bio: I am a full-stack web developer, a student of life, and an artist. I view technology as away of monitoring the worldâ€™s progress and as a means of giving back to underserved communities. With my work I seek to employ creative, thought provoking solutions to areas of community development, social inequalities, and technological evolution.

testimonials.text: Luke is a brilliant problem solver with an eye on efficiency. Luke is capable of synthesizing complex concepts into smaller easier to understand pieces. He was an asset to my team and I would gladly work with him again.

That Luke Harrison must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
